message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.CR, cs.SI, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with the construction and classification of locally repairable codes, which are mainly used for distributed storage. This falls under the scope of information theory (cs.IT) and distributed systems (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the correction of erasures, which is a topic in coding theory (cs.CR). Additionally, the paper mentions the field size, which is a parameter in algebraic coding theory (cs.SI). Finally, the paper discusses explicit constructions of codes, which is a topic in computational complexity (cs.CC).
